title: Voice Command Integration for Care Alerts
summary: As a full-stack developer, I want to integrate voice command functionality that allows elderly users to trigger urgent health alerts through simple voice interactions so that caregivers can receive timely notifications and respond quickly.

title: Adaptive Learning for User Preferences
summary: As a full-stack developer creating healthcare applications, I want the ALFRED system to utilize machine learning algorithms to adaptively learn user preferences, so that I can design more personalized and intuitive interactions for elderly users and their caregivers.

title: Multi-Modal Interaction Support for Accessibility
summary: As a developer, I want to implement multi-modal interaction capabilities in my applications so that elderly users with varying technical literacy can easily access and utilize the functionalities of the ALFRED system.

title: Robust API for Third-Party Voice Applications – Detailed Documentation and Use-Case Examples
summary: As a full-stack developer creating healthcare applications, I want access to a robust API with detailed documentation and use-case examples so that I can easily integrate third-party voice applications that enhance user interaction for elderly users and caregivers.

title: Configurable Alert and Notification Preferences
summary: As a developer, I want to create customizable alert and notification settings for elderly users so that caregivers receive timely updates on urgent health events, enabling a more responsive care environment.

title: Event-Based Health Notifications
summary: As a developer, I want to integrate calendar events into the ALFRED system so that elderly users receive timely health reminders based on their scheduled activities.

title: Voice-Driven User Authentication
summary: As a full-stack developer creating healthcare applications, I want to implement secure user authentication through voice recognition so that elderly users can easily access their applications while ensuring data security and compliance with healthcare regulations.
